title: Greystar Benefits from AI Leasing Assistant
author: Nate Shames
summary: Greystar has reported significant improvements in operational efficiency and tenant satisfaction through the use of an AI leasing assistant provided by MeetElise.
main_content:
"Greystar, which manages and operates over an estimated $220 billion of real estate in more than 200 markets globally, recently reported a 112% increase in their lead to tour conversion after partnering with the team at MeetElise."

**Read on American Daily Post >** [link](https://www.americadailypost.com/real-estate-giant-greystar-benefits-from-ai-leasing-assistant/)
